channel.title: Webclient Error
channel.description:
Name: app
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
Details:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\****\Desktop\client.class (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 10 more
Please Help. My client.htm says this:
<html> <title>DragonGuild - the massive online adventure game by Xele Ltd.</title> <center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" archive="http://www.megaupload.com/?d=2O84JPYL" code="client"> </applet></center> </html>
Reward will be given when webclient can be fixed.

item.title: Webclient Error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

umm you can’t load a client from a download host,maybe get a www.ucoz.com website and upload it to there and run your client there

but good try though

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Error
item.dc:creator: @DragonGuild DragonGuild
item.description:
@DragonGuild wrote:

yes i do i just downloaded it

when the console loads, it loads with jre1.6.0_03 :):):)[br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2007, 12:47:53 PM[/size][hr]thanks for helping

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Error
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

you dont have the latest java or JRE [br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2007, 12:45:46 PM[/size][hr]if you ahve the latest java open up your runsever in notepad en replace it with this :

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server lowmem members 0 pause
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03 replace this with your version look it up in the java map

Read full topic
